title.rendered: The School for Good and Evil

content.rendered:
Directed by Paul Feig

Written by David Magee. Paul Feig. Soman Chainani

Star Kit Young(Rafal / Rhian). Sophia Anne Caruso(Sophie). Cate Blanchett(The Storian (voice)). Liam Woon(Footman). Rachel Bloom(Honora). Rob Delaney(Stefan). Sofia Wylie(Agatha). Sandra Cole(Callis). Denis Coleman(Bully). Mark Charles(Eric). Ella Hehir(Young Sophie). Mahli Perry(Young Agatha). Stephanie Siadatan(Vanessa). Adam Ray(Town Tough). Patti LuPone(Mrs. Deauville). Abigail Stones(Leonora). Malik Ibheis(Shadow Creature / Wolf Guard). Olivia Booth-Ford(Cayla). Earl Cave(Hort). Callum Henson(Wolf Guard). Joelle(Joelle). Holly Sturton(Beatrix). Emma Lau(Kiko). Briony Scarlett(Reena). Rosie Graham(Millicent). Chinenye Ezeudu(Chinen). Petra Hajduk(Fairy). Naomi Weijand(Fairy). Louis McMiller(Fairy). Ayo Jordan(Fairy). Freya Parks(Hester). Demi Isaac Oviawe(Anadil). Kaitlyn Akinpelumi(Dot). Harvey Scrimshaw(Harvid). Charlize Theron(Lady Lesso). Kerry Washington(Professor Dovey). Myles Kamwendo(Nicholas). Ali Khan(Chaddick). Oliver Watson(Tristan). Misia Butler(Tarquin). Ally Cubb(Gregor). John Macdonald(Cyclops). Jamie Flatters(Tedros). Laurence Fishburne(School Master). George Coppen(Sweet Cupid). Steven Calvert(Evil Cupid). Mark Heap(Professor Manley). Michelle Yeoh(Professor Anemone). Peter Serafinowicz(Yuba). Shanti Deen-Ellis(Wish Girl). Ben Aycrigg(Reaper). Hugh Irvine(Town Taylor (uncredited)). Nicanor Mendoza III(Swordsman (uncredited)). Elise Newman(Ballroom Dancer (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Chris Castaldi. Soman Chainani. Paul Feig. Laura Fischer. Stephen Jones. Jeff Kirschenbaum. Kane Lee. Greg Lubin. Patricia Riggen. Joe Roth. Zack Roth. Jane Startz

Production Feigco Entertainment. Jane Startz Productions. Netflix
